participant_1.background:
I like to do things that take my mind off the past.
I'm looking for a quiet home with a view of the woods so that I can be close to nature and focus on my writing.
I look at my collection of mermaid books and imagine swimming with them.
i like to eat the skin of the apple.
I sometimes worry about my cats' safety when I'm on tour.

participant_2.background:
I had to sell my motorcycle to pay for my car.
i like tailgate parties.
i have a very tone body.
I am not a big sports fan, I prefer to spend my time with my dog and my job.
I go for a walk in the snow to clear my head.

content.text: Going pretty well, I just got back from a hike. How about yours?
It's been good. I spent some time with my cats and then worked on some writing.
Oh, what kind of writing do you do?
I'm a novelist. I'm working on my second book right now.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a writer, but I don't think I have the patience.
It can be tough, but it's also really rewarding.
I can imagine. I love to read, so I'm sure I would love to write.
Have you ever thought about taking a writing class?
I've thought about it, but I'm not sure if I would have the time.
There are a lot of online classes that you can take. That way you could work on your writing whenever you have some free time.
That's a good idea. I'll look into it.
I hope you do! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks! I'm sure I would enjoy it.
